channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Millions of Americans expected to lose health coverage over the next decade
item.description: In the Rio Grande Valley of south Texas, 1 in 3 people already lack health insurance. That's expected to get worse as President Trump's spending cuts ...

item.title: Is it the magnesium or the massage? The facts about magnesium lotion for sleep
item.description: Social media influencers claim that using lotion with magnesium promotes sleep. But there's little evidence magnesium taken in this way is effective.

item.title: Programas de inteligencia artificial te ayudan a interpretar tus resultados de laboratorio
item.description: Muchos pacientes están utilizando programas como ChatGPT de OpenAI, Claude de Anthropic y Gemini de Google, para interpretar sus datos médicos

item.title: Why Are More Older People Dying After Falls?
item.description: Some researchers suspect that rising prescription drug use may explain a disturbing trend.
